text: What's the weirdest food combination you secretly enjoy?
If you were a ghost, who or what would you haunt?
What's an irrational fear you have?
What's the most embarrassing song on your playlist?
If animals could talk, which species would be the rudest?
What's a weird habit you have?
What's the silliest argument you've ever been in?
If you had to replace your hands with household objects, what would you choose?
What's a conspiracy theory you find amusing (even if you don't believe it)?
What's the funniest thing you've seen a stranger do?
If you could only speak in movie quotes for a day, which movie would you choose?
What's a superpower that sounds great but would actually be terrible?
What's the most ridiculous purchase you've ever made?
If you could have an animal sidekick, what would it be and what would be its special skill?
What's a common saying or phrase that makes no sense to you?
What's the weirdest dream you've ever had?
If you were a vegetable, what vegetable would you be?
What's a social norm you find bizarre?
What's the most useless piece of trivia you know?
If you could make one law that everyone had to follow, what silly law would you enact?
